_header: I pray you lady Mary dear
Title(s): ‘Ane orisoun to our Lady callit Obsecro’
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: ‘Ane orisoun to our Lady callit Obsecro’ — sixty-one couplets

BLAru285.First Lines: I PRay ȝow lady mary deirGoddis mothir and madin cleir…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …Goddis mothir ay michtyWell of piete And mercy
BLAru285.Attributed Title: Ane orisoun to our lady callit Obsecro (rubric, bottom f. 190)

                Harleian 6919.
Scottish Text Society

BLAru507.Transcription:
I pray ye lady deregodis moder & mayden cleremy praȝere
                    þat þu hereqwen I call on þe& dwille nogh lange fra
                    mebot soyn þu comme me till
